name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 7, candidates from Haikou, Wenchang, Baisha, Chengmai, Qionghai, Baoting and other places said that they did not receive barcodes in their area during the Hainan Province Chinese Language Test. In response, the staff of the Hainan Provincial Examination Bureau said that the barcodes were not issued due to printing errors, but it would not affect the subsequent examinations and scoring.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 7, a piece of news that "a candidate was not allowed to enter the examination room because his shoes had metal in them, and the special police on duty quickly took him to buy slippers" went viral, and the candidate was cyberbullied because he was wearing a short skirt.
Later, the candidate said on social media that he could not bear the pressure and chose to give up the college entrance examination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the candidate's description, he was photographed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 7, the former daughter-in-law reported her father-in-law under her real name that he had a huge amount of unknown property. As an ordinary employee of the Suizhou branch of the Agricultural Development Bank of China, he purchased a villa worth tens of millions of yuan and was suspected of illegally participating in the construction of the Han-E and Han-Cai Expressways.
On June 8, the bank announced that the person reported was a retired employee and was being verified and investigated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Heilongjiang. A man posted a video to report China Life Insurance under his real name. The man said that he bought life insurance for his child in 2015, paying 10,000 yuan a year. At that time, the salesperson said that after paying for 10 years, he could withdraw the money at any time. But in 2022, he was told that he could only withdraw the money 70 years after the expiration.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 6, Wuhan, Hubei. Guo Shengyuan, former deputy secretary of the Xiantao Municipal Party Committee, fell to his death in a nearby hotel after receiving medical treatment at Tongji Hospital.
According to an insider, the other party has retired and suffers from depression.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Erhai Scenic Area, Dali, Yunnan. A little boy was wearing a Japanese scarf, which caused dissatisfaction among tourists on Friday. During the period, the two sides pushed each other. The poster of the video said that "the boy was beaten twice by the Northeastern buddy and the southern buddy respectively, and the white cloth on his head was torn off."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 5, Jiang Zemin’s eldest son Jiang Mianheng published an open letter on the school’s official website after he stepped down as president of Shanghai University of Science and Technology. He mentioned in the letter that “I have completed two ten-year terms” and “new forces need to continue to join the leadership team”.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 7, blogger Liu Zhi Fei Yang released a video, revealing the process of his application for the position of CCTV program director. The video introduced that this seemingly director position is actually a sales position, responsible for contacting entrepreneurs from all over the country to pay to appear on CCTV's interview program.
The recruiter said that this program has been running for 10 years and it only costs 300,000 to appear on CCTV.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 35th anniversary of June 4th, we cooperated with China Human Rights @hrichina and Humane China @HChina89 to release a series of June 4th special pictures. The scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 27 (June 8)
[There are still sporadic protests in universities in Beijing] [Chai Ling reported safety through Hong Kong TV]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Lianyungang, Jiangsu. Blogger @连云港吴强 exposed that the local Banpu High School Parents Committee notified parents in the group to pay 1,000 yuan for extended service fees to be used for teachers' evening classes. The blogger then received a text message from someone claiming to be a reporter from Guanyun County, who asked him to delete the post and said they could get together.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Wuhan, Hubei. Two young people display the Palestinian flag at the Yellow Crane Tower scenic area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 8, Noa, a Chinese-Israeli girl who had been held hostage by Hamas for eight months, was rescued a few hours ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported online that on the evening of June 7, outside a public security bureau in Guangzhou, a group of young people shouted and provoked the police inside, asking them to "come out and stop hiding." The reason is currently unknown, but it is suspected to be related to the confiscation of electric vehicles.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 8, a video of a farmer complaining about earning only 1,500 yuan from 18 mu of wheat was forwarded by netizens on Douyin.
The woman in the video said that she worked hard for seven months and earned a total of 1,500 yuan from 18,000 kilograms of wheat. She lamented that "If you want to change the current situation of farmers, you can't install a few street lights, repair a few roads, and paint a few walls. In recent years, the cost of farming has increased year by year, and the people lose money on whatever they grow... Low grain prices hurt farmers, and farmers are too disappointed."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 8, the "Cyberspace Administration of China" issued a notice that several big Vs were banned for "defaming corporate image" and other reasons. Among them, accounts such as "Niu Shuoche" maliciously defamed the quality of a certain brand of cars and the image and reputation of the car company and its founder. Accounts such as "Mozi Business Theory" spread rumors, maliciously interpreted the equity structure and product packaging patterns of a drinking water company, spread false information and extreme remarks, and defamed and defamed the company's image and were closed in accordance with the law and contract.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 8, the mirror sources of Nanjing University and the University of Science and Technology of China also announced their closure due to notices from their superiors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 3, Tianjin. The owners of Qingshanxiyu and nearby communities came to the local education bureau to protest because they were dissatisfied with the school districts divided by the government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 4, Xi'an, Shaanxi. The villagers of Huokou Village were dissatisfied with the compensation proposed by the government for demolition and held banners at the Baqiao Subdistrict Office to protest their rights. During the protest, the villagers and the police had a scuffle, and some villagers were injured and fell to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 3, in Cangzhou, Hebei, the Lijingyuan real estate project was left unfinished, and the owners held up banners to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 3, in Chifeng City, Inner Mongolia, Jinglanmuhe Water-saving Equipment Co., Ltd. has been in arrears of wages for workers for three years. The workers came to the local government to ask for their wages, but the staff impatiently told the workers to go to the Petition Bureau to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 8, Hengshui, Hebei. Binhu International Mall forcibly occupied the shops of the owners and owed them rent. The owners put up banners to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Linyi, Shandong. The construction of Country Garden·City Investment Emerald Bund was left unfinished, and the owners jumped from the roof to defend their rights.
